Title: Gail, SEFE settle LNG non-delivery dispute
Description: India’s Gail and and SEFE Marketing & Trading Singapore, a former unit of Gazprom, have settled their dispute over the non-delivery LNG in 2022-2023.
Author: JS

Title: J​​apan’s MOL names fourth newbuild LNG vessel for QatarEnergy
Description: Japanese shipper Mitsui OSK Lines has named its fourth newbuild LNG carrier, Limail, as part of QatarEnergy’s LNG fleet expansion for the North Field and Golden Pass LNG projects. The naming ceremony took place at the Hudong-Zhonghua Shipbuilding yard in China.
Author: CK

Title: Eni to relocate Nguya FLNG vessel for Congo; reaffirms project start-up timing
Description: Italy’s Eni plans to relocate the Nguya floating LNG vessel, under construction for the second phase of its Congo FLNG export project, to another shipyard. The move follows the US targeting Chinese shipyard Zhoushan Wison Marine and Offshore as part of a broader sanctions package aimed at degrading Russia’s ability to generate revenue from its oil and gas exports.
Author: CK
